name: STREꝇ ꝇNGTH+
description:
You find yourself in the middle of a facility filled with infecter killer robots. You must kill them all and escape. But in the search for a Strength+ poweup you find a man with a knife, and now you must share your strength, never getting too far from each other.

Controls:
  • Move: WASD / Arrow Keys
  • Jump: Space
  • Switch Characters: Tab
  • Shoot (Character 1): Left Click
  • Stab (Character 2): Right Click
  • Respawn: R
  • Pause: Esc / P
Credits:
